name: JPMorgan Chase
description: A global financial services giant offering traditional retail banking and complex investment banking with a massive physical branch network.

name: Goldman Sachs
description: Focuses on institutional banking and high-net-worth wealth management via its Marcus platform and traditional private wealth division.

name: HSBC
description: A massive international bank specializing in cross-border corporate banking and trade finance for global enterprises.

name: Barclays
description: UK-based universal bank known for strong credit card operations and comprehensive corporate lending services.

name: Revolut
description: A global digital-only neobank providing multi-currency accounts and instant P2P payments for travelers and tech-savvy consumers.

name: Stripe
description: Provides economic infrastructure for the internet through a B2B payment gateway API used by millions of businesses to accept online payments.

name: Chainalysis
description: Blockchain data platform that provides compliance and investigation software to government agencies and cryptocurrency businesses.

name: Plann
description: Personal finance app that aggregates bank accounts to provide AI-driven budgeting and automated spending categorization.

name: Coinbase
description: A secure US-based exchange platform for buying and selling institutional-grade digital assets and institutional custody solutions.

name: Deel
description: HR and fintech platform that automates international payroll and tax compliance for companies hiring freelancers and remote workers.

name: Wise
description: Specializes in low-cost international money transfers using a mid-market exchange rate to reduce hidden fees for expatriates.

name: Brex
description: Provides corporate credit cards and expense management software specifically tailored for high-growth startups and venture-backed firms.

name: Betterment
description: The pioneer of automated robo-advising offering retail investors low-cost algorithmic portfolio management and retirement planning.

name: Wealthfront
description: A leading robo-advisor focusing on tax-advantaged automated investing and high-yield cash accounts for millennial professionals.

name: Aspiration
description: A sustainable financial firm that offers 'Spend & Save' accounts where deposits are not used to fund fossil fuel projects or firearm manufacturing.

name: Fundrise
description: Real estate crowdfunding platform that allows retail investors to buy fractional shares of high-quality commercial real estate portfolios.

name: Uniswap
description: A decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol on Ethereum that uses automated market makers (AMMs) to provide permissionless liquidity.

name: Robinhood
description: A retail brokerage known for zero-commission stock trading and a mobile-first interface designed to democratize access to financial markets.

name: Citadel Securities
description: A major market maker and liquidity provider that handles high-frequency institutional block trading and execution services.

name: Xpansiv
description: The leading market infrastructure for scaling the energy transition via the buying and selling of certified carbon offsets and RECs.

name: OneGold
description: A digital platform for buying and storing physical precious metals in secure vaults like the Royal Canadian Mint.

name: PitchBook
description: Comprehensive data platform for private equity and venture capital professionals to monitor deal flow and startup valuations.

name: Kiva
description: A peer-to-peer (P2P) lending marketplace that allows individuals to lend small amounts to entrepreneurs in emerging markets.

name: Upstart
description: An AI-driven lending platform that uses alternative data points like education and employment history to determine creditworthiness.

name: Rocket Mortgage
description: A digital-first mortgage lender that has automated the residential home loan process to provide instant pre-approvals.

name: Bluevine
description: Provides small business financing through invoice factoring and flexible lines of credit for B2B companies.

name: John Deere Financial
description: Specialized agricultural lending providing equipment financing and crop insurance for large-scale farming operations.

name: Sallie Mae
description: The primary private student loan provider in the US focusing on higher education and vocational training financing.

name: Flexport
description: Combines freight forwarding with trade finance to provide logistics companies with capital based on their global shipping data.

name: Traxpay
description: Supply chain finance platform that allows maritime and cargo logistics companies to optimize their working capital and payment terms.

name: CareCredit
description: Specialized healthcare credit card for medical procedures and elective surgeries not covered by traditional insurance.
